original_prompt: An ethereal deity composed of intricate white translucent optical fibers and fibrous mycelium web, holding a glowing miniature cyberpunk city cube in cupped hands. High angle close-up shot. The entity wears a thick rectangular glass prism visor with rainbow refraction. Color Palette: The body and background are deep cyan, teal, and cold white; The city cube glows with intense neon pink, sunset amber, and warm purple. Lighting: Strong uplighting from the cube illuminating the face from below, subsurface scattering through translucent fingers making them glow pink. Material: Spun sugar texture, wet gloss, biological resin. Background: Dark cosmic void with stardust. Shot on 105mm Macro lens, f/1.8, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic, volumetric lighting, ray-tracing reflections --ar 9:16 --stylize 800 --v 6.0
theme: 3D渲染艺术 / 后人类赛博神性肖像

subject_variables.material_composition: intricate white translucent fibrous network (optical fibers, spun sugar, neural mycelium)
modifiers: NO solid skin - body defined by fiber web
subject_variables.replaceability_notes: 主体可替换为其他材质构成的生物（水晶、液体金属、粒子云等）

visual_style.art_style: Biopunk + Ethereal Fantasy + Holographic + Optical Art

technical_parameters.depth_of_field: Extremely shallow - sharp focus on hands & cube, cosmic bokeh background

lighting.primary_source: Diegetic uplighting from the artifact cube
special_effects: Subsurface scattering (SSS) through fingers → pink/orange glow

mood_atmosphere.pose_meaning: The Creator's Gaze - protective, gentle, focused

composition.focal_strategy: Shallow DOF (f/1.8) - isolate subject from background
composition.pose_direction: Head tilted down, chin tucked, eyes on artifact

color_scheme.concept: Cold Shell, Warm Heart (外冷内暖)
color_scheme.saturation: High on artifact, desaturated on body

the_cube.description: Glowing miniature cyberpunk metropolis in glass hyper-cube

quality_score.comments: 结构极度清晰，细节密度极高，技术参数完整，模块化程度优秀

advantages: 模块独立性强 - 每个部分可单独提取复用
技术参数完整 - 包含相机、渲染引擎、光学效果
色彩策略创新 - '外冷内暖'概念可迁移
对立结构清晰 - 明确定义必须与禁止的元素
细节层次丰富 - 从宏观到微观全覆盖
参数化表达 - 使用具体数值而非模糊描述

reusable_templates.name: Cold-Warm Color Opposition
reusable_templates.structure: {subject}, Color: {body}={cool colors}, {focal object}={warm colors}, Lighting from {focal object}

reusable_templates.name: Macro + SSS Template
reusable_templates.structure: {subject}, {close-up angle}, {translucent material}, {light} causing SSS through {body part}, {lens}mm Macro, f/{aperture}

reusable_templates.name: 3-Layer Depth Structure
applications: 所有需要景深层次的场景

high_value_modules.module: Cold Shell Warm Heart Color Strategy

ai_generation_challenges: 次表面散射的精确控制
